    • Uses of IDevice in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices

      Subinterfaces of IDevice in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IOutDevice
      Device where the writing gets managed by the event loop
      interface  IOutDeviceEx
      Device where the recalculation of parameters gets managed by the event loop
      interface  ISensor
      Input Device
      Classes in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices that implement IDevice 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameConsole
      Feed Throttle, Rudder, Aleron and Elevator from a Game Console to the ParameterStore.
      class  IMUDevice
      Integration device for the Inertial measurement unit (IMU) into our Flight Controller to determine the pitch, roll, yaw and heading.
      class  OutDevice
      Output Device which needs to be configured to implement the following flow: sensor =) scaler =) control =) IPwmOut.
      class  QuadMotorController
      Implementation of a simple motor controller for Quadrotors.
      class  Sensor
      Generic implementation for a sensor: It needs to be configured by defining the input processor and the input hardware (pin) / protocol.
      Constructors in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.devices with parameters of type IDevice 
      Constructor and Description

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SensorBMP180
      Barometric pressure sensor.
      class  SensorGY87
      10 DOF (degree of freedom) boards and all sensor handling is by i2c bus It consists of a BMP180,HMC5883 and MPU6050.
      class  SensorMPU6050
      MPU6050 Accelerometer and Gyroscope Sensor.
      class  SensorQMC5883
      3-Axis Digital Compass IC.
